Html:
Is there any chance we can get more filters added to the optimizer for more classes/roles? The bear model seems to have all the useful filters but others (moonkin, paladin, etc) were lacking.

I'd like to see a couple options included for hit rating, mana regen and I'm sure there are others people would find useful. While in theory enough spell power can offset the dps loss of low spell hit I'd rather optimize around being hit capped so there is less variance between fights (because of random misses).
Post the requirement and model you're looking for, and we'll see what we can do.

Personally I'm looking for both spellhit and mana regen in the boomkin model. They're the two things I usually try to juggle.

And I know a friend who is a holy pally was looking for mana regen as an option too.
